clean¶

Data cleaning utilities for scraped GradCafe records.

clean._remove_whitespace(str_)[source]¶

Remove newline and tab characters from a string.

Parameters:

str (str) – Raw string value to normalize.

Returns:

Input string with \n and \t removed.

Return type:

str

clean.clean_data(raw_data)[source]¶

Normalize raw scraped payloads into clean application records.

The function standardizes the term field, removes extra whitespace from every value, trims application status date strings to date-only format, and converts known sentinel values (for optional fields) to None.

Parameters:

raw_data (list[dict]) – Raw list of application payload dictionaries.

Returns:

Cleaned payload dictionaries in original order.

Return type:

list[dict]

clean.save_data(cleaned_payloads, path='applicant_data.json')[source]¶

Write cleaned payloads to disk as JSON.

Parameters:

  • cleaned_payloads (list[dict]) – Cleaned records to persist.

  • path (str) – Output JSON path.

Returns:

None.

Return type:

None

clean.load_data()[source]¶

Load cleaned payloads from applicant_data.json.

Returns:

Parsed JSON payload list.

Return type:

list[dict]
